title: How Thymen Arensman Gained 5 Kilos While Racing the 3,500km Giro d’Italia
content:
Arensman isn't the only rider to have gotten bigger while burning tens of thousands of calories during a grand tour. Here's why it happens, and how teams try to prevent it.

Read the full article at How Thymen Arensman Gained 5 Kilos While Racing the 3,500km Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
